org.kitodo.production.plugin.importer.massimport.googlecode.fascinator.redbox.sru

Class SRUClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kitodo.production.plugin.importer.massimport.googlecode.fascinator.redbox.sru.SRUClient

  • public class SRUClient
extends Object

    A light-weight SRU client implementation. Originally written for the purpose of searching the National Library of Australia's Party Infrastructure Project (PIP) via GET (ie. not POST or SOAP, both of which PIP also supports).

    More information/documentation for PIP is available on the NLA wiki.

    Author:
    Greg Pendlebury

    Credit for some of inspiration has to go to another light-weight implementation available under LGPL we looked at before we started coding: SRUClient from 'Sinciput'.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SRUClient

        public SRUClient()
        Default Constructor. Connect to the NLA unless otherwise instructed. This will rely on the more complicated constructor defaulting to the searching for EAC-CPF records as well.

      • SRUClient

        public SRUClient(String baseUrl)
          throws MalformedURLException
        Constructor indicating the base URL for the SRU interface.
        Parameters:
        baseUrl - The Base URL for the SRU interface. Required.
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - Will be thrown if the 'baseUrl' provided is not well formed.

      • SRUClient

        public SRUClient(String baseUrl,
                 String schema)
          throws MalformedURLException
        Constructor indicating the base URL and metadata schema.
        Parameters:
        baseUrl - The Base URL for the SRU interface. Required.
        schema - The SRU 'recordSchema' to use. NULL values will default to EAC-CPC ('urn:isbn:1-931666-33-4')
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - Will be thrown if the 'baseUrl' provided is not well formed.

      • SRUClient

        public SRUClient(String baseUrl,
                 String schema,
                 String packing)
          throws MalformedURLException

        Constructor indicating the base URL, metadata schema and format packing for responses.

        Parameters:
        baseUrl - The Base URL for the SRU interface. Required.
        schema - The SRU 'recordSchema' to use. NULL values will default to EAC-CPC ('urn:isbn:1-931666-33-4')
        packing - The SRU 'recordPacking' to use. NULL values will default to 'xml'
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - Will be thrown if the 'baseUrl' provided is not well formed.

      • SRUClient

        public SRUClient(String baseUrl,
                 String schema,
                 String packing,
                 String version)
          throws MalformedURLException

        This constructor is where the real work happens. All the constructors above provide wrappers of this one based on how much you want to deviate from the defaults (which assume you are connecting to the NLA.

        Parameters:
        baseUrl - The Base URL for the SRU interface. Required.
        version - The SRU 'version' to use. NULL values will default to v1.1
        schema - The SRU 'recordSchema' to use. NULL values will default to EAC-CPC ('urn:isbn:1-931666-33-4')
        packing - The SRU 'recordPacking' to use. NULL values will default to 'xml'
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - Will be thrown if the 'baseUrl' provided is not well formed.

    • Method Detail

      • setRecordSchema

        public void setRecordSchema(String newSchema)

        Used to change the 'recordSchema' after instantiation. All outgoing requests sent after this call will use the new schema.

        Parameters:
        newSchema - The new schema to use.

      • setVersion

        public void setVersion(String newVersion)

        Used to change the 'version' after instantiation. All outgoing requests sent after this call will use the new version.

        Parameters:
        newVersion - The new version to use.

      • setPacking

        public void setPacking(String newPacking)

        Used to change 'recordPacking' after instantiation. All outgoing requests sent after this call will use the new format.

        Parameters:
        newPacking - The new packing format to use.

      • testResponseResource

        public void testResponseResource(String fileName)
                          throws IOException

        Used in unit testing to indicate a package resource to use as search responses, rather then submitting a real SRU query.

        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of a resource 'file' to use as simulated search result.
        Throws:
        IOException - If encoding/access issues occur accessing the resource.

        public SRUResponse getResponseObject(String xmlData)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        SRUResponse An instantiated response object

      • getResultList

        public List<org.dom4j.Node> getResultList(String xmlData)

        Parse an XML String response and get a List Object containing all of the SRU search results.

        Parameters:
        xmlData - The XML String returned from the search
        Returns:
        List A List containing a DOM4J Node for each search result

      • generateSearchUrl

        public String generateSearchUrl(String query)

        Generate a basic search URL for this SRU interface.

        Parameters:
        query - The query String to perform against the SRU interface.
        Returns:
        String A URL that can be retrieved to execute this search.

      • generateSearchUrl

        public String generateSearchUrl(String query,
                                String operation)

        Generate a search URL for this SRU interface. No sorting or pagination.

        Parameters:
        query - The query String to perform against the SRU interface. Required.
        operation - The 'operation' perform. If null this will default to 'searchRetrieve'.
        Returns:
        String A URL that can be retrieved to execute this search.

      • generateSearchUrl

        public String generateSearchUrl(String query,
                                String operation,
                                String sortKeys)

        Generate a search URL for this SRU interface. No pagination.

        Parameters:
        query - The query String to perform against the SRU interface. Required.
        operation - The 'operation' perform. If null this will default to 'searchRetrieve'.
        sortKeys - Sorting. Optional, with no default.
        Returns:
        String A URL that can be retrieved to execute this search.

      • generateSearchUrl

        public String generateSearchUrl(String query,
                                String operation,
                                String sortKeys,
                                String startRecord,
                                String maxRecords)

        Generate a search URL for this SRU interface. This is the actual implementation method wrapped by the methods above with most parameters as optional.

        Parameters:
        query - The query String to perform against the SRU interface. Required.
        operation - The 'operation' perform. If null this will default to 'searchRetrieve'.
        sortKeys - Sorting. Optional, with no default.
        startRecord - Starting record number. Optional, with no default.
        maxRecords - Maximum rows to return. Optional, with no default.
        Returns:
        String A URL that can be retrieved to execute this search.

      • getSearchResponse

        public String getSearchResponse(String query)

        Perform a basic search and return the response body.

        Parameters:
        query - The query String to perform against the SRU interface.
        Returns:
        String The response body return from the SRU interface.

        operation - The 'operation' perform. If null this will default to 'searchRetrieve'.
        Returns:

        public String getSearchResponse(String query,
                                String operation,

        Perform a search and return the response body. No pagination.

        Parameters:
        query - The query String to perform against the SRU interface. Required.
        operation - The 'operation' perform. If null this will default to 'searchRetrieve'.
        sortKeys - Sorting. Optional, with no default.

      • getSearchResponse

        public String getSearchResponse(String query,
                                String operation,
                                String sortKeys,
                                String startRecord,
                                String maxRecords)

        Perform a search and return the response body. This is the actual implementation method wrapped by the methods above with most parameters as optional.

        Parameters:
        query - The query String to perform against the SRU interface. Required.
        operation - The 'operation' perform. If null this will default to 'searchRetrieve'.
        sortKeys - Sorting. Optional, with no default.
        startRecord - Starting record number. Optional, with no default.
        maxRecords - Maximum rows to return. Optional, with no default.
        Returns:
        String The response body return from the SRU interface.

      • nlaGetRecordById

        public String nlaGetRecordById(String id)

        Search for a record from the National Library of Australia with the provided identifier. If multiple records match this identifier only the first will be returned.

        Parameters:
        id - The identifier to search for
        Returns:
        String The record matching this identifier. Null if not found

      • nlaGetNationalId

        public String nlaGetNationalId(String id)

        Search for a record from the National Library of Australia with the provided identifier. If multiple records match this identifier only the first will be returned.

        Parameters:
        id - The identifier to search for
        Returns:
        String The record matching this identifier. Null if not found

      • nlaGetIdentityById

        public NLAIdentity nlaGetIdentityById(String id)
                               throws SRUException

        Search for a record from the National Library of Australia with the provided identifier. Process and return their Identity record.

        Parameters:
        id - The identifier to search for
        Returns:
        NLAIdentity A processed Identity
        Throws:
        SRUException - If processing the Identity fails.

      • nlaGetResponseBySearch

        public SRUResponse nlaGetResponseBySearch(String search)
        Search for a records from the National Library of Australia and parse the resultant XML is a wrapper object.
        Parameters:
        search - The search to submit to the NLA
        Returns:
        SRUResponse A parsed response

      • nlaGetResponseBySearch

        public SRUResponse nlaGetResponseBySearch(String search,
                                          String startRecord,
                                          String maxRecords)
        Search for a records from the National Library of Australia and parse the resultant XML is a wrapper object.
        Parameters:
        search - The search to submit to the NLA
        startRecord - Starting record number. Optional, with no default.
        maxRecords - Maximum rows to return. Optional, with no default.
        Returns:
        SRUResponse A parsed response

      • nlaGetIdentitiesBySearch

        public List<NLAIdentity> nlaGetIdentitiesBySearch(String search)

        Search for records from the National Library of Australia. Process and return their Identity records. It is important to note that if any Identity fails to process it will not appear in the List.

        Parameters:
        search - The search to submit to the NLA
        Returns:
        List A list of processed Identities

      • nlaGetIdentitiesBySearch

        public List<NLAIdentity> nlaGetIdentitiesBySearch(String search,
                                                  String startRecord,
                                                  String maxRecords)

        Search for records from the National Library of Australia. Process and return their Identity records. It is important to note that if any Identity fails to process it will not appear in the List.

        Parameters:
        search - The search to submit to the NLA
        startRecord - Starting record number. Optional, with no default.
        maxRecords - Maximum rows to return. Optional, with no default.
        Returns:
        List A list of processed Identities
